thread.title: EU Auto Makers Hit Bumps on Road to Geneva Auto Show

author: William Boston
title: EU Auto Makers Hit Bumps on Road to Geneva Auto Show
text:
BERLINâ€”European auto executives gather this week for the annual Geneva Motor Show amid a new trans-Atlantic trade rift, stubborn diesel woes, and the threat of new competition. 
President Donald Trump, days after stoking a global trade war by announcing steep tariffs on U.S. imports of steel and aluminum, on Saturday revived threats to impose tariffs on auto imports, targeting about a third of all new cars sold in the U.S. and singling out the European Union. 
...
